title: Interpretation of seeing green and black olives in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansThe interpretation of seeing green and black olives in a dream has many interpretations and this is what we will discuss in this article.Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing black olives in a dream indicates a lot of nourishment and kindness, and seeing olive trees means peace and good initiative with the surrounding environment, whether It was family, friends, or neighbors. We see yellow olives in a dream indicating illness, distress, and adversity. Olive oil in a dream indicates unhappiness and fatigue soon. As Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing Oliver in a dream, it indicates a respectable, committed woman who is close to God, and he may designate a woman who is distinguished in her rationality. Interpretation of a vision Olives for a single woman: Buying black olives in a dream for an unmarried woman shows her exceptional beauty and repetition of words. As for seeing black olives in a dream, it indicates the abundance of valuable opportunities in one’s life, which requires focus, attention, and seizing opportunities. The dream may indicate the progress of a person distinguished by morals and wealth. Or Whoever dreams that he is picking olives or harvesting them, then this dream is a sign of happiness and close commitment. As for the one who saw herself in a dream eating olives, this dream is shown by someone who proposes to her, and mutual admiration appears between them, and they get married, and God will bless them with good offspring, and God. He knows best. If you see yourself eating olives in a dream, this may indicate the number of degrees you will obtain. Interpretation of seeing an olive tree for a married woman. A married woman dreams of buying olives, then this dream is good and shows profits and many good things that will triumph over her and her family. And who dreams that she She picks olives in a dream, then this dream indicates the approaching pregnancy. As for the one who eats olives in the dream, this dream indicates that she will enter the field of trade and achieve large profits from this work. And whoever dreams that he distributes olives to the poor, this indicates an abundance of food and a lot of money. Interpretation A man’s dream: A married man dreams that he is eating olives, then this dream is a good sign and doors will open for him, whether in the field of science, culture, or a new field of work. As for whoever sees himself distributing olives to the living or the dead, this indicates a good reputation, conduct, and behavior. Interpretation of seeing olives For a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman dreams of buying olives from the market, then this dream indicates that she will receive the child she wants. As for the one who was seen collecting olives, this dream indicates the birth of a virtuous child for her and her father. To dream of eating olives is good news for her and indicates her safety and the safety of her child. Therefore, We provide you with all possible interpretations of seeing olives in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we appreciate your feedback. Below the article, we will provide the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a little money

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams with a little money in different situations, I dreamed that I had a little money, I dreamed that I had a little money and found some banknotes and coins in the dream, all of these dreams may make us dream, and we may feel anxious, and seeing money brings many interpretations and interpretations, Therefore, today we present to you more details about the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about a little money by Ibn Sirin: In the opinion of the great scholar and great dream interpreter Ibn Sirin, dreams are interpreted according to the number of coins that the dreamer found, in addition to the type of this money, whether it is metal or paper, And its color. . It also has a meaning. Whoever sees in a dream an old red paper currency, this is a sign that the dreamer follows the doctrine of Abu Hanifa, and it is also a sign of the dreamer’s piety and sincerity in worship and performing worship. Whoever finds money in his dream, it is better for him to have a son, even if he loses it. He may lose one of his children, and the dream indicates his inability to perform the Hajj obligation. In the event that the dreamer sees a large treasure of money, it is good for him that he will obtain a lot of money through his work or through his inheritance, and a lot of paper money means a lot of goodness for the pioneer and livelihood in children or work. However, if the monarch finds Five notes It is an indication of the five prayers and wants to perform the prayer at its specified time. The note indicates the arrival of sustenance and righteousness to the dreamer, in addition to gaining more knowledge and closeness to God and fulfilling the imposed duties. Ibn Sirin explains that whoever dreams of throwing money from his house, or giving money For another person, it is an indication that he will soon be freed from worries and anxiety. And whoever finds that he has found money missing, he will be exposed to some problems, but after that comes comfort and joy, and gold coins in a dream mean kindness and blessings to the people of the house and saving money soon. It is a sign of gaining wealth and status. On the contrary, Ibn Sirin says that money in a dream can be a sign of disputes, disagreements and bankruptcy for the pioneer, and whoever has a lot of money in his dream has a lot of anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about little money for a single woman: If an unmarried woman dreams that her money has become scarce, this is a sign that she will miss a lot of opportunities and regret it. An unmarried woman who sees money in a dream could be a sign of her extreme confusion or anxiety about something, and this vision could indicate that The dreamer is a person characterized by strong ambition and a desire to achieve goals and success. If an unmarried woman finds that her money has decreased due to theft, this is a warning to her to stop wasting time and the need to know the importance of time and exploit it in useful matters. If the unmarried woman finds that she has a lot of coins She will get into many problems, but if she sees that she has a lot of paper money, she will be happy with her possession of gold or money in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a little money for a married woman

Interpretation of a dream of a little money for a single woman: If an unmarried woman dreams that her money has become little, this is a sign that she will miss many opportunities and regret it. An unmarried woman who sees money in a dream can be a sign of her extreme confusion or anxiety about something, and this vision can indicate that the dreamer is a person characterized by strong ambition and a desire to achieve goals and success. If an unmarried woman finds that her money has decreased due to theft, this is a warning to her to stop wasting time and the need to know the importance of time and use it in useful matters. If an unmarried woman finds that she has a lot of coins, she will fall into many problems, but if she sees that she has a lot of paper money, she is happy to have gold or money in reality. title: Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser in a dream through a website, see the website roy2a.com. The name Nasser is an Arabic name derived from the word victory, and it is one of the old names, but it is still famous because of its supernatural meaning that indicates glory and victory. Seeing the name Nasser in a dream has connotations. We will explain many things to you through this article for both single women and pregnant women, according to prominent dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Anbulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser in a dreamSeeing the name Nasser in a dream A good vision indicates the appearance of good news in the life of the dreamer. The name Nasser in a dream An indication of the death of worry, sadness, and comfort near the dreamer. Seeing the name Nasser in a dream indicates changes in the life of the dreamer for the better. Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a person named Nasser in a dream is a sign of success that will lead this dreamer to happiness and success in his life. The name Nasser in a dream is a sign. To start a successful business or trade and achieve profits in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser in a single woman’s dream. Seeing the name Nasser in a single woman’s dream indicates a person with good personal qualities. The name Abdel Nasser written on the wall in a single woman’s dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems that plague her. In the previous period. Seeing the name Nasser in one dream. She had suffered injustice or oppression in her life, so the vision was good news for her that God would soon help her and command her to do so. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Nasser in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the name Nasser in a dream for a married woman indicates getting rid of disputes and problems that She faces it in her life, whether at home or with those around her. If a wife dreams that she has a son named Nasser, it is a sign of great sustenance, happiness, and goodness for her, her home, and her children. Seeing a child named Nasser in a married woman’s dream and eating him is a sign that she will soon become pregnant and get what she wants for a period of time. Time. The name Nasser in a married woman’s dream is a praiseworthy vision that indicates victory over obstacles, worries, and sorrows in her life and her ability to overcome all difficulties, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the name Nasser in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of ease of pregnancy and childbirth, and she and her fetus will be healthy. Good. The name Nasser in a pregnant woman’s dream, just before her due date, there is good news that God gives her whatever she wants and asks for, whether she wants the fetus, female or male, and God knows best. Seeing the name Nasser in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates getting rid of enemies and defeating them in the face of those who They want to deceive them. Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser in a dream for a man: Seeing the name Nasser in a man’s dream is good news for her that his condition has changed for the better, and if he is afflicted with any affliction at work or trade, this is evidence of his demise, God willing. If a person sees in his dream that his name is Nasser, it is a sign of Profit and a source of livelihood for him. The name Nasser in a man’s dream indicates freedom from worries and sorrows. We are pleased to show you the place to receive your dreams “Interpretation of seeing the name Nasser” through comments and the dream team will interpret your dream

title: Red color in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: The color red in a dream for a divorced woman: Red is a happy color, a color that has connotations of joy and happiness. The interpretation of the color red in a divorced woman’s dream is that God will provide her with joy, goodness, and happiness. Wearing red in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the presence of people trying to help and support her in her distress. Seeing an ex-husband wearing red in a dream for a divorced woman indicates the continuation of problems and disagreements between them. While a divorced woman’s dream of walking on a red carpet indicates a stable and calm life. Seeing the color red in a dream for a divorced woman if she sees a lot of clothes in red. It bodes well for the near future. Seeing people wearing pure red clothes indicates many friends and acquaintances. And do not forget to read our article about: The color red in the dream of single people. Seeing the color red in a dream of a single woman. The color red in a woman’s dream is good in most cases, and for single women, pregnancy indicates passion and love. The dream could be a sign that a single person has strong feelings towards someone. The color red in a single person’s dream symbolizes energy, strength, optimism, and the desire to live and enjoy life. Seeing a red bag or shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman means happy news. Also, a dream about Giving a red blouse in a dream to an unmarried woman indicates moving to a better situation, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing red in clothes for a married woman: Seeing a red dress for a married woman indicates wealth and goodness. But if the wife is sick and sees red clothes in her dream, this indicates death. Where Seeing red clothes is annoying for the patient. Interpretation of the color red in a dream for a pregnant woman. The color red in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates goodness, happiness, and nourishment. If a pregnant woman’s dress is red in a dream, this indicates an easy and smooth birth. Seeing a pregnant woman in her newborn’s bed in color Red means that her baby will be healthy, God willing. Seeing the color red in a man’s dream. The color red in a dream symbolizes energy, strength, and vitality. As for seeing a man wearing red, this indicates immorality, fun, and bad manners. Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi said: The red color is for men’s clothing. In a dream, there is an unpleasant vision. While some other commentators argued that the red color for men indicates goodness. They concluded that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, gave him a red suit that he was wearing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing red in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the red color in a dream in general. However, it symbolizes danger, a life full of chaos and lust. He also said that the color red indicates the fertility of a married or married man. According to Ibn Sirin, the respected scholar, the red color in a dream is a sign of happiness and abundance of feelings. Vitality and feelings of anger and love. Ibn Sirin touched on Interpretation of a dream about red gemstones. He said that they indicate joy and happiness or danger and pain. One of the terrifying interpretations of Line Siren

title: Interpretation of seeing deaf and dumb people in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a deaf and mute person in a dream: If someone sees him in a dream that he is deaf, this indicates his anxiety and many problems around him. It also shows that this person is far from religion and morals, and that he is unable to make decisions and evaluate situations, as well as his inability to solve them. . the problem. Good for the viewer. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a deaf and dumb person in a dream. For a single girl. Interpretation of seeing a deaf and dumb person in a dream. This dream is for an unmarried or unmarried girl. When she dreams of a deaf person or as if she has lost her hearing, this indicates her ability to protect herself. It also indicates a dimension People have a sick soul. If an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying a deaf man, this indicates that there are some problems and troubles in her life. An unmarried girl sees a deaf child, this is an auspicious vision that indicates that it brings goodness, food, and blessings. When an unmarried woman sees a deaf person This indicates that this person has no personality or will. One of the undesirable things for an unmarried girl is that she finds in her dream that she is marrying a deaf man because she will face some crises and problems in her life. If an unmarried woman sees that she cannot speak, this is evidence of... Unjustly accused of something and suffering. When you see a single girl, you do not hear what indicates that this girl is upset about something that she cannot say. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deaf and dumb person in a dream for a married girl, and if a married woman sees that she is not listening to this, this indicates Her safety and security, after harm from her, and after her sickness from her. If she sees that her husband is deaf in a dream, this means that she is seriously controlling the affairs of the house and also that her husband is hiding something that he does not want to reveal. It also indicates understanding, affection and love between the spouses. Also, seeing her is not Being able to speak suggests anxiety and fear for her husband and how he will treat her. If she is found mute in the dream, this is evidence of her purity and chastity. If she sees her husband deaf in a dream, this indicates the intensity of her love for him. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream InterpretationDream of seeing a deaf and mute person in a dream Dreams for pregnant women. If a pregnant woman sees a deaf person in a dream, this is a sign of happy events, which will facilitate her birth and provide her with a healthy and healthy child. To dream of a deaf and mute pregnant woman means that troubles, worries, and problems will be avoided. If a pregnant woman sees a deaf child in a dream, this Something beautiful indicates that it will bring goodness and nourishment. A pregnant woman’s dream of a deaf signifies happy news awaiting her, and after she gives birth, God will provide her with a lot. Also, if a pregnant woman sees someone she does not know who is not listening, this indicates that she is protecting her husband and her home. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deaf and mute person in a dream for a man If a person mumbles in his sleep, it is because this man is weak in character and will, and it appears that he is an ignorant man who does not know anything. Seeing a deaf and mute man in a dream indicates his lack of faith and his distance from his religion. If a man sees a person who is deaf and dumb in a dream A deaf person talks to him or tells him something

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing death in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing death in a dream from the Moments website. Interpretation of death in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin went on to explain death in a dream as regretting a major sin committed by the person watching. Whoever dreams in his dream that he died and then returned to life, this indicates that he has insight. He committed a great sin and regretted it. As for whoever sees in a dream that he died without getting sick, and there were no forms of death in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer will have a long life. A pregnant woman seeing in a dream that she will not die, this indicates the approaching time of her death. As for Whoever sees in his dream that he will not die under any circumstances, this indicates that the observer will testify for the sake of God. As for whoever sees in his dream that he has died and sees in his dream that he is shrouded, washed, and comfortable, this indicates that the person with insight chose his worldly life, corrupted his religion, and was defeated. His future. Interpretation of the dream: seeing the death of the President of the Republic in a dream, this indicates the destruction of his country. As for someone who dreams of someone he knows who has died and then comes back to life, this indicates that the dreamer will get married. As for the interpretation of seeing a dead person who died again, this is a sign of someone’s death. As for the dreamer With his death, but there are no forms of death in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer’s owner’s house will be demolished or destroyed. As for whoever sees in a dream a person close to him who has died, and no screams or screams are heard in the dream, this indicates that this person will marry or travel. If The dream was accompanied by crying and screaming, then this indicates that a person with foresight will overcome financial difficulties. Interpretation of death in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream someone she knows has died, this means that she will get married. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she She dies and is not buried, this indicates that she will live a happy marriage and will live a beautiful, happy and peaceful life. Interpretation of a dream about the death of the fiancée or lover for an unmarried girl, this indicates the approaching date of their marriage. Interpretation of death in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees someone who has died in her dream, this indicates However, a happy fate awaits her. Witnessing the death of a husband and a married woman not being buried, this is an indication that she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of death in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her partner died and was not buried, this indicates that she will give birth more clearly. Clarifying the idea of ​​death In a pregnant woman’s dream, there is evidence that she will suffer from severe pain during the birth process. Interpretation of death in a dream for the father, mother, brother, and sister. Awareness of the father’s death in a dream indicates the long life of the person with insight. Watching one’s mother die in a dream indicates guiding one with insight. Vision The death of a brother in a dream can mean money that will come to you soon. As for someone who dreams of the death of his sister, this indicates joy and happiness. Interpretation of death in a dream on a specific date. A person’s awareness that he will meet his death on a specific date, a specific day, a month and a year is a warning to the dreamer that He wakes up and returns to the path of righteousness, guidance, repentance to God, and return to the right path. It is the possibility of repentance for the dreamer. Seeing someone...

title: Interpretation of jujube in a dream Seeing jujube in a dream

preview.html: A dream about sea buckthorn for a single girl, for a pregnant woman, married, divorced, married and single, whether she eats, buys picked red and green sea buckthorn, a sidr tree by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq from Al-Nabulsi and more. Interpretation of sea buckthorn in a dream. Sea buckthorn in a dream shows a man of good character who loves and praises people. And the sea buckthorn tree in a dream is a sign of a man obtaining money, survival, profit, power, prestige, and honor. Seeing sea buckthorn indicates diet, and whoever eats sea buckthorn is good in his religion. The sea buckthorn tree indicates an Iraqi man who is not deficient in his religion and benefits. Sea buckthorn in a dream is presented. Iraq, and it was said that dirhams and dinars are permissible. Whoever eats sea buckthorn is good in his religion, and if he is worthy of the state and rule, then this will be achieved. Whoever sees sea buckthorn in a place, and its owner does not know its owner, this indicates survival in what is in it of the derivatives of its name, even if he knows who it is in relation to it. His dream will come true. The people of religion will have an increase in the debt, which is good. Eating sea buckthorn will give the sultan strength in his authority, and whoever is suitable for the agency or who is recommended to imitate it, and the sea buckthorn will remain. Because of its alertness. If the dreamer is in distress and sees hippopotamuses outside of his time, this indicates that he will remain there until his time, as if he were in a good condition. Sea buckthorn was given by Iraq, and it is incomplete money, and its moisture is stronger than its dryness, and the yellowing of its color does not harm Because of the price of his tree. Al-Baqi: A man praises him with the approval of the one who expresses the honor of his tree and the strength of its essence. It is for those with worldly wealth, and for people of religion an increase in religion and justice, and it is money other than dinars or dirhams. It is said that a woman came to Ibn Shirin and said: I saw that Sindra was in My house fell and she picked up two pieces of sea buckthorn and said: Do you have an absent husband? She said: Yes, he said: He died and you inherit two thousand. Sea buckthorn in a dream is food, and whoever eats sea buckthorn is good in his religion, even if he is worthy of the state and rule, this will get him. A dream about sea buckthorn means in any way that there is money and no Something for him comes from the fruits prepared for him, especially if they are pure and taste good, and it was said that sea buckthorn was provided. From Iraq, it is incomplete money, and its moisture is stronger than dry, and the yellowing of its color does not harm the price of its tree. Whoever sees that the buckthorn has taken his good will and the strong command of the single buckthorn, suggests a long stay for the origin of the name. Seeing a sidr seller in a dream means healing from diseases and cleansing from sins, and if he enters a sick person, he will die. Seeing sea buckthorn in a dream: Sea buckthorn in a dream is a person worthy of praise, according to the consensus of those who express the honor and strength of its tree. In the interpretation: it is money or sustenance, and its moisture is better than its dryness, and its yellowing does not harm it (unlike the rest of the fruits that the yellow color does not like, which is the color that indicates... Illness in its interpretation. Dreams). Ibn Sirin said: Fruits are not equal to sea buckthorn and rice in interpretation, and perhaps it is the best of them all. It was said: For whoever seeks this world in terms of money, he earns and spends, and for whoever seeks the afterlife or religion, he will increase in worship and closeness to God Almighty. .It is also good, and Sidr can refer to

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing balloons in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing balloons in a dream, which is a small bag filled with air or light gas so that it can rise into the air. They come in many sizes and colors and kids love to play with them. It is also used for birthdays and happy occasions, but what is the meaning of seeing balloons in a dream? This vision certainly indicates many signs in reality, as blowing a balloon can indicate unfulfilled goals and hopes, and bursting a balloon indicates problems and troubles. A balloon can indicate failure or it can indicate joys and happy occasions, and blowing up a balloon indicates overcoming adversity. Interpretation of a dream about balloons by Ibn Sirin: Seeing balloons in a dream indicates, as Ibn Sirin explained, a feeling of disappointment and frustration. Seeing a balloon exploding in a dream It means renewing hope in life. Dreaming of seeing balloons in a dream Balloons symbolize arrogance. Seeing balloons high in the air means quick but short-term success. As for a balloon flying in the air, it indicates the adventures of a fortuneteller. Seeing inflation in a dream, because it indicates the beginning of A project that exceeds the dreamer’s energy and capabilities. Interpretation of a dream about colored balloons: Seeing colored balloons in general indicates celebration and joy. If you see a red balloon in a dream, this indicates a storm of troubles and problems. Seeing a white balloon in a dream indicates good faith and a feeling of joy and pleasure. Dream Seeing balloons in a dream: A black balloon indicates deception and bad news. A green balloon in a dream indicates the realities that the dreamer is experiencing. A yellow balloon in a dream indicates money. Seeing a black and white balloon indicates a difference of opinion and an inability to make a decision. Interpretation of a dream about balloons exploding. Seeing a balloon explode in a dream with a loud sound is something that one did not expect. Seeing a dreamer blowing up a balloon in a dream indicates the goals that he seeks to achieve. Dreaming of seeing balloons in a dream, as a balloon exploding in a dream indicates renewed hope in reality. Interpretation of a dream Balloons rising to the sky: Seeing a balloon rising to the sky due to the circumstances surrounding the dreamer that the dreamer is trying to overcome. Balloons also show the dreamer’s desire to escape and not face reality. Interpretation of a dream of an inflated balloon: A dream of seeing balloons in a dream Seeing an inflated balloon in a dream is for goals that have not been achieved in reality. An inflated balloon in a dream also symbolizes the stresses of life in reality. Interpretation of a dream about colored balloonsSeeing balloons in a dream can indicate frustration and disappointment. It also indicates arrogance and vanity. Or they announce renewed hope. It shows that you see balloons high in the air. Achieving success and success. In academic or professional life. Seeing playing with balloons indicates danger. Dreaming of seeing balloons in a dream or undertaking tasks and projects beyond the viewer’s ability. Seeing colored balloons indicates joy and pleasure. Seeing balloons exploding suggests renewed hope and renewed life. Seeing a balloon indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about going with the dead in a car by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about going with the dead person in the car. When the dreamer dreams of a dead person, the dreamer’s connection to the deceased person appears and this expresses how much he misses him. The dead are from their imagination, our only consolation is that we are all dead in the end and we will join those to whom our hearts are connected, and in this article we will tell you the interpretation of the dream of going with the dead in the car with all the details.Interpretation of the dream of going with the dead in the car by Ibn SirinDeath is one of the things common to all creatures that were created in This universe, because every beginning has an end, and so does our life, and that life is short, so we must make the most of our existence to do good. Actions to win heaven that no eye has seen or seen, and thus heard, and in the previous sentence the sky was described in an unparalleled way, and it was not clear what it would be like. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of going with the dead in the car to mean that the dreamer is going through a difficult period as a result of the loss of a loved one in The humiliation of the subconscious mind that makes the dreamer dream of this person. Because of his connection to him and the presence of many beautiful memories with the dead person, psychiatrists explained that when a person gets used to the lungs of this person, he is always linked to his mind with beautiful memories and others, as described as addiction. Interpreted Ibn Sirin dreamed of going with the dead in the car, which the dreamer cannot imagine and believes that this person has died. See also: Interpretation of the dream of the Kaaba in a dream for all interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of going with the dead in the car for the married woman. Death does not harm the dead, but rather harms the living. When does a person die, if There was someone who loved him and had a close relationship with him, who remains sad for him even if days, months and years have passed since his death. He will remain in his memory and some people cannot complete their lives without him, so he should be patient with the separation and pray for the dead. The scholars interpreted that if the dreamer saw in Her dream is a dream of going with the dead in a car for a married woman, then this indicates that she feels very sad because of the death of her husband. The people of knowledge explained that if the dreamer dreams of going with the dead in a car for a married woman, then the dreamer is going through a difficult and difficult period, so those around her should not To leave her alone and be patient. The scholars explained that if the dreamer sees in her dream a dream of going with the dead person in the car for a married woman, this is evidence that the dreamer will bear responsibility for herself and her children after death. Face. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about going with the dead in the car for a pregnant woman. In this life, many people turn away from the idea of ​​death, and even strongly refuse to think about it, and this is a mistake because a person must face his fears and be able to prepare for what comes After death, this thing comforts a person because his end is known and he is away from the falsehood and bad deeds that people expect from him. The scholars explained that if a pregnant woman dreams of riding with the dead person in the car, this indicates that she feels very sad about the death of a jinn.
